author: Lai Kew Chai J:
casename: Sie Choon Poh (trading as Image Galaxy) v Amara Hotel Properties Pte Ltd (No 2)
counsel: Navinder Singh (Navin and Co) for the plaintiff; Adeline Chong (Harry Elias Partnership) for the defendant
tags-parsed: Landlord and Tenant/Covenants/Repair/Tenant claiming damages from landlord for breach of covenant to maintain and keep in repair common areas/Landlord relying on exclusion clause for damage caused in absence of landlord's gross negligence/Whether landlord entitled to rely on exclusion clause/Whether landlord's conduct amounting to gross negligence
